dialogue.introduction: I am Myoukou, of the Myoukou-class Heavy Cruisers. Let us work on this together.
dialogue.library_intro: A heavy cruiser built under the auspices of the Washington Naval Treaty. I'm a first-class warship of the Japanese Navy designed by Yuzuru Hiraga. This name has also been passed on to Aegis destroyers of the modern MSDF.
dialogue.secretary1: Admiral. Did you call for me?
dialogue.secretary2: Is there... something I can help you with?
dialogue.secretary3: If its something difficult to say, shall we talk over there?
dialogue.secretaryidle: The Admiral seems very busy... In that case, I should do everything I can at hand, so that the Admiral may call on me whenever I'm needed.
dialogue.secretarymarried: If the Admiral falls, I...please at least rest a bit when you are tired. It is Myoukou's wish.
dialogue.wedding: I greatly respect the Admiral's fabulous strategy and tactics, and always shall.
dialogue.show_players_score: It looks like there is a message for you from Command.
dialogue.equipment1: Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
dialogue.equipment2: Oh my. I'm getting stronger and stronger. What should I do?
dialogue.supply: Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Are you sure that someone like myself would be allowed to rest?
dialogue.ship_construction: Oh, I'll go greet our new addition.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. With wonderful results!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: We must not stand down from this battle!
dialogue.night_battle: Then there's no other choice... Moving to pursue!
dialogue.mvp: It's all thanks to everyone's hard work. Do commend them, would you please?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: What else... can I possibly do...?
dialogue.sunk: See you... in another life... good bye.
dialogue.white_day_2015: Eh, Admiral. These cookies are for me? Thank you very much! Let me dig in! Uhuhu, I'm happy!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Congratulation admiral! It's a two years anniversary! We too are also happy about this, yep!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Tsuyu, the season of the rain. Listening with your eyes closed, even the sound the rain soothes your heart.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: It's become fairly hot hasn't it. A Summer, thing isn't it. Ah, Takao! Always cheerful. Eh? A swimsuit?
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn. It's a lonely season in some respects. But, it's suitable for readers. Admiral, what are you reading?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Admiral. I just baked a cake. Have some if you please.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun. Here, this is Admiral's portion of the beans. Demon's out! ....Hehehe, isn't it fun?

hourly.0000: 0000 hours at night. It's already this late. The day goes fast, doesn't it Admiral?
hourly.0100: 0100 hours. Admiral, pushing yourself too hard might be tough on your health.
hourly.0200: 0200 hours. This Myoukou will look over the remainder, okay? Admi-... Oh...
hourly.0300: 0300 hours. No, I was just taken by surprise when you put the blanket over me.
hourly.0400: 0400 hours. Admiral, what should I do with this? Oh? Admiral, are you sleeping?
hourly.0500: 0500 hours. I better take care of everything while the Admiral's asleep.
hourly.0600: 0600 hours. Hngh... It's morning. The Admiral's job certainly is a tough one. Oh, a visitor?
hourly.0700: 0700 hours. Coming! Oh, Ashigara, what's wrong? You look surprised?
hourly.0800: 0800 ho-... Ah, good morning. Ashigara was here just... Admiral? You don't look so good.
hourly.0900: 0900 hours. (Sigh) ...Admiral? You forgot your appointment with Ashigara for a discussion over breakfast, didn't you.
hourly.1000: 1000 hours. Goodness. I'll make sure to apologize to her in your stead. By the way, about this document...
hourly.1100: 1100 hours. Yes, I suppose we'll have an early lunch while we work.
hourly.1200: 1200 hou- Oh... another visitor? Come in! Eh-... Haguro? Why are you so teary?! Ah, don't leave!
hourly.1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, I see why you're so troubled... Very well. We'll chat after our work.
hourly.1400: 1400 hours. Admiral, I don't mean to scold, but can we talk for a minute?
hourly.1500: 1500 hours. Admiral, we'll leave out the fact that you're forgetful. But promises are things that are meant to be kept.
hourly.1600: 1600 hours. All the girls look forward to seeing you. And forgetting that is... Are you listening to me!
hourly.1700: 1700 hours. Now you have plans for dinner with someone as well, don't you?
hourly.1800: 1800 hours. Wha-... You want me to make curry tonight? Okay... Very well.
hourly.1900: 1900 hours. Here's Myoukou's Special Curry. The meat has been glazed with brandy, and...
hourly.2000: 2000 hours. Well then, I'll go patrol the base perimeters. ...Admiral?
hourly.2100: 2100 hours. I suppose all the Kanmusus love the Admiral anyway. (Giggle)
hourly.2200: 2200 hours. Everything is quiet on the base! Oh. Nachi? Where are you going with that bottle of sake?
hourly.2300: 2300 hours. Hmm? You had plans to drink with the Admiral? (Sigh) Goodness... Admiral, you are unbelievable...
